name: Fulton_Dual_Reclining_Loveseat
reviews: I was disappointed that the brand advertised was not the brand received (Fulton advertised and AC Pacific delivered). I believe the workmanship is substandard because when not reclined, there is a gap between the bottom of the right seat cushion and the foot piece that flips up when reclined. There is also a gap between the backs of the two seats. The outside edge of the top of the flap on each side is stitched so that it does not lie flat as it should.
Have been looking for furniture that was high enough for my husband to sit and get up easily. This was perfect. I no longer have to help him.
description: This Fulton brown bonded leather reclining loveseat is the ultimate in reclining comfort. The overstuffed cushions with the recliners make this furniture ideal for watching movies or entertaining guests. Set includes: Reclining loveseatMaterials: Leather, wood, metalFinish: BrownUpholstery material: Bonded leatherUpholstery color: BrownUpholstery fill: High-density foamSeat height: 18.5 inchesDimensions: 39 inches high x 67 inches inches wide x 37.5 inches deepStyleContemporaryMaterialWoodChair TypeReclinersAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownFurniture Frame MaterialMetal, Plastic, WoodFurniture PatternSolid
